id: 04-02 draft ESRS-GRI Interoperability Index SR TEG meeting 5 December.txt_chunk2
text:
Given the high level of interoperability achieved, entities reporting under ESRS can be considered as reporting ‘with reference’ to the
GRI Standards (see GRI 1: Foundation 2021). The [draft] index shows the relationship between the ESRS and GRI disclosures to
facilitate reporting ‘with reference’ to the GRI Standards.
